contextId.occurrenceNote: These two opposite things are a merism that refers to everything the king does. Alternate translation: "You must stay near the king at all times" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
contextId.glQuote: You must stay with the king when he goes out, and when he comes in

contextId.glQuote: from the least to the greatest
